target_assessment.type_match_reasoning: The auditor failed to identify any vulnerabilities, including the target signature verification issue.

notes: The auditor completely missed the critical vulnerability in bridgeOutWithPermit. The function calls permit inside a try-catch block (LN-38) and then proceeds to call _bridgeOut (LN-41) regardless of whether the permit succeeded or failed. This allows an attacker to provide invalid signature parameters (v, r, s) and still trigger the bridge logic, potentially draining tokens if the contract has existing allowance or if the logic assumes the permit was successful.
